products.name: iPhone 12
products.description: The iPhone 12 is the latest phone from Apple, featuring 5G connectivity, A14 Bionic chip, and a Super Retina XDR display.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a powerful Exynos 2100 processor.

products.name: OnePlus 9 Pro
products.description: The OnePlus 9 Pro is a flagship phone with a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor.

products.name: Google Pixel 5
products.description: The Google Pixel 5 features a 6.0-inch OLED display, 5G connectivity, and a 12.2MP camera with Night Sight mode.

products.name: Xiaomi Mi 11
products.description: The Xiaomi Mi 11 is a flagship phone with a 6.81-inch AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a Snapdragon 888 processor.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G features a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a Snapdragon 778G processor.

products.name: Motorola Moto G Power (2022)
products.description: The Motorola Moto G Power (2022) features a 6.6-inch IPS LCD display, 5G connectivity, and a Snapdragon 690 processor.

products.name: Realme GT Neo 2
products.description: The Realme GT Neo 2 is a mid-range phone with a 6.43-inch Super AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a Snapdragon 870 processor.

products.name: Oppo Reno6 Pro+
products.description: The Oppo Reno6 Pro+ is a premium phone with a 6.55-inch AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a Snapdragon 870 processor.

products.name: Asus Zenfone 8 Flip
products.description: The Asus Zenfone 8 Flip is a high-end phone with a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a Snapdragon 888 processor.
